original_text: And I have also heard the groaning of the children of Israel, whom the Egyptians keep in bondage; and I have remembered my covenant.
korean_text: 이제 애굽 사람이 종으로 삼은 이스라엘 자손의 신음 소리를 내가 듣고 나의 언약을 기억하노라

sentences.original_text: the groaning of the children of Israel
whom the Egyptians keep in bondage
and I have remembered my covenant
